title: Firm A, Firm B don't collude

content.question: If each firm simultaneously chooses its pricing strategy without collusion, Firm A’s and Firm B’s profits would be which of the following?

choices.label: Firm A’s Profit Firm B’s Profit $150 $ 50
Firm A’s Profit Firm B’s Profit $100 $100
Firm A’s Profit Firm B’s Profit $100 $150
Firm A’s Profit Firm B’s Profit $ 50 $100
Firm A’s Profit Firm B’s Profit $ 50 $ 50

content.answer: Firm A’s Profit Firm B’s Profit $ 50 $ 50

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model using quantitative data or calculations.
